name: Dragon Quest 25 Collection: Famicom & Super Famicom Dragon Quest I-II-III
overview: Dragon Quest 25th Anniversary Collection, officially titled Dragon Quest 25 Shunen Kinen: Famicom & Super Famicom Dragon Quest I·II·III (ドラゴンクエスト25周年記念 ファミコン&スーパーファミコン ドラゴンクエストI・II・III, translated as Dragon Quest 25th Anniversary Commemoration: Famicom & Super Famicom Dragon Quest I·II·III) is a compilation of Dragon Quest, Dragon Quest II and Dragon Quest III. It was released by Square Enix on 15 September 2011 in Japan exclusively for Wii. The collection was developed by Intelligent Systems.
